title: Neal on Black Arts Movement - evaluate source

content.question: Respond to parts A, B, C, and D. Describe one claim made in the source. Describe a broader historical context of the source. Using one specific example, explain how a development described in the source influenced Black culture. Briefly explain how a development described in the source influenced the development of African American Studies.

frqParts.text: Respond to parts A, B, C, and D. Describe one claim made in the source. Describe a broader historical context of the source. Using one specific example, explain how a development described in the source influenced Black culture. Briefly explain how a development described in the source influenced the development of African American Studies.

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
